title: Looking for Ungraded T206 Boston Nat'l Cards
author: KryKslr

posts.post_title: Looking for Ungraded T206 Boston Nat'l Cards
posts.post_content:
I'm building a T206 Boston Nat'l team set and I'm looking for cards to buy....need everything except for Johnny Bates and Vive Lindaman...should be 12 other cards in the set.

As far as condition, I'm looking for low-mid grade, no tears, no major creases, no paper loss, and good centering (nothing with a big border at the top/bottom or a name cut off). Corner wear is ok as long as it's not drastic.

The two I've already bought in the condition I'm looking for were around $20-22, so I'd like to keep it close to that...
